question: You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.You have just moved into a new home and are planning to hold a party. You are worried that the noise may disturb your neighbour.Write a letter to your neighbour. In your letterintroduce yourselfdescribe your plans for the partyinvite your neighbour to comeYou do NOT need to write any addresses.You should write at least 150 words.
text: I am your new neighbour and I writing now to inform you that I am planning for a party next Saturday in my apartment. So, I am worried about disturbing your comfort time during the weekend. However, I will be very glad to have you in my evening.

First, let me introduce myself to your honour. My name is China Tarhini, I am the new renter of the flat just beside yours. Actually, I am a civil engineer and currently working in a construction company. Basically, I will be living with my husband in the new house for about three years.

For this reason, I am organizing an event to celebrate my new apartment. Mainly, the evening will include DJ and sharing drinks. Moreover, I already put a schedule for various games that could be enjoyable for the majority. Unfortunately, a lot of thunder would be produced during the night, and I am very concerned about every neighbour’s complaint.
Finally, it is a pleasure to have you in my celebration to know more about each other and to have an amazing time together.
I am looking forward to hearing from you.
